text:
Every AI looks the same.

So here's how to choose the right one:

1. Claude from Anthropic.

 ☑ Best for coding.
 ☑ Learns & mimics your writing voice.
 ☑ Fast, focused deep-research answers.

2. ChatGPT from OpenAI.

 ☑ Biggest plugin ecosystem.
 ☑ Impressive memory feature.
 ☑ Strongest reasoning model (o3).

3. Grok from xAI

 ☑ Bundled with X Premium+.
 ☑ Real-time X trends in seconds.
 ☑ Edgy, witty brainstorming partner.

4. Gemini from Google

 ☑ Swallows million-words PDFs.
 ☑ Native multimodal Google power.
 ☑ Tight integration with Workspace.

5. Perplexity AI from Perplexity

 ☑ Research mode with auto citations.
 ☑ Academic filter for peer papers.
 ☑ No-login quick fact checks.

6. Meta AI from Meta

 ☑ Open-source.
 ☑ Free inside WhatsApp & Insta.
 ☑ Generates images via /imagine.

I share how to use them at: how-to-ai.guide
